TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CodePagesEncodingProvider extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供对桌面 .NET Framework 支持但 UWP 应用不支持的代码页的编码提供程序的访问权限。

span.span: Provides access to an encoding provider for code pages supported in the desktop .NET Framework but not in UWP apps.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 中的.NET 核心的.NET 本机实现仅支持类。The class is supported in the .NET Native implementation of .NET Core only. 为 Windows 桌面.NET Framework 支持 Unicode 和代码页编码的大量。The .NET Framework for the Windows desktop supports a large set of Unicode and code page encodings. 通用 Windows 平台和.NET Native，另一方面，支持仅以下编码：The Universal Windows platform and .NET Native, on the other hand, support only the following encodings: - ASCII （代码页为 20127） 返回属性。ASCII (code page 20127), which is returned by the property. - ISO 8859-1 （代码页 28591）。ISO-8859-1 (code page 28591). - Utf-7 （代码页为 65000） 返回属性。UTF-7 (code page 65000), which is returned by the property. - Utf-8 （代码页 65001），它返回属性。UTF-8 (code page 65001), which is returned by the property. - Utf-16 和 UTF-16LE （代码页为 1200年） 返回属性。UTF-16 and UTF-16LE (code page 1200), which is returned by the property. - UTF-16BE （代码页 1201年），它可以通过调用实例化或具有构造函数`bigEndian`值`true`。UTF-16BE (code page 1201), which is instantiated by calling the or constructor with a `bigEndian` value of `true`. - Utf-32 和 UTF-32LE （代码页 12000），即属性。UTF-32 and UTF-32LE (code page 12000), which is returned by the property. - UTF-32BE （代码页 12001），它可以通过调用实例化构造函数具有`bigEndian`参数并提供的值`true`方法调用中。UTF-32BE (code page 12001), which is instantiated by calling an constructor that has a `bigEndian` parameter and providing a value of `true` in the method call. 除代码页 20127，不支持代码页编码。Other than code page 20127, code page encodings are not supported. 类扩展要提供给.NET 本机和通用 Windows 平台 (UWP) 应用这些代码页。The class extends to make these code pages available to .NET Native and Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps. 若要使用这些额外的代码页，请执行以下操作：To use these additional code pages, you do the following: - 将 System.Text.Encoding.CodePages.dll 程序集的引用添加到你的项目。Add a reference to the System.Text.Encoding.CodePages.dll assembly to your project. - 检索从静态对象属性。Retrieve a object from the static property. - 将 对象传递给 方法。Pass the object to the method. 后注册对象，它支持的编码均可通过调用的重载; 不应调用重载。After an object is registered, the encodings that it supports are available by calling the overloads of ; you should not call the overloads.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Instance As EncodingProvider
public: static property System::Text::EncodingProvider ^ Instance { System::Text::EncodingProvider ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取桌面 .NET Framework 支持但当前 .NET Framework 平台不支持的代码页的编码提供程序。

span.span: Gets an encoding provider for code pages supported in the desktop .NET Framework but not in the current .NET Framework platform.

value.span: 允许访问当前的.NET Framework 平台上不支持的编码编码提供程序。

span.span: An encoding provider that allows access to encodings not supported on the current .NET Framework platform.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回使编码可应用到该目标的对象[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]或更高版本，否则是仅在 Windows 桌面上的.NET Framework 中可用。The property returns an object that makes encodings available to apps that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)] or a later version and that otherwise are available only in the .NET Framework on the Windows desktop. .NET Framework 的 Windows 桌面上支持较大数量的字符编码和代码页。The .NET Framework on the Windows desktop supports a large number of character encodings and code pages. 你可以获取编码的完整列表，通过调用方法，这是在 Windows 桌面上完整的.NET Framework 中可用。You can get a complete list of encodings by calling the method, which is available in the full .NET Framework on the Windows desktop. 适用于 UWP 应用，.NET native 另一方面，支持仅以下编码默认情况下：.NET Native for UWP apps, on the other hand, supports only the following encodings by default: - ASCII （代码页为 20127） 返回属性。ASCII (code page 20127), which is returned by the property. - ISO 8859-1 （代码页 28591）。ISO-8859-1 (code page 28591). - Utf-7 （代码页为 65000） 返回属性。UTF-7 (code page 65000), which is returned by the property. - Utf-8 （代码页 65001），它返回属性。UTF-8 (code page 65001), which is returned by the property. - Utf-16 和 UTF-16LE （代码页为 1200年） 返回属性。UTF-16 and UTF-16LE (code page 1200), which is returned by the property. - UTF-16BE （代码页 1201年），它可以通过调用实例化或具有构造函数`bigEndian`值`true`。UTF-16BE (code page 1201), which is instantiated by calling the or constructor with a `bigEndian` value of `true`. - Utf-32 和 UTF-32LE （代码页 12000），即属性。UTF-32 and UTF-32LE (code page 12000), which is returned by the property. - UTF-32BE （代码页 12001），它可以通过调用实例化构造函数具有`bigEndian`参数并提供的值`true`方法调用中。UTF-32BE (code page 12001), which is instantiated by calling an constructor that has a `bigEndian` parameter and providing a value of `true` in the method call. 若要检索一种编码，在.NET Framework 中的 Windows 桌面上，但在 UWP 应用中不存在，请执行以下操作：To retrieve an encoding that is present in the .NET Framework on the Windows desktop but not in UWP apps, you do the following: - 将 System.Text.Encoding.CodePages.dll 程序集的引用添加到你的项目。Add a reference to the System.Text.Encoding.CodePages.dll assembly to your project. - 获取从静态对象属性。Get the object from the static property. - 传递对象传递给方法来执行由提供的编码公共语言运行时可用的对象。Pass the object to the method to make the encodings supplied by the object available to the common language runtime. - 调用重载来检索的编码。Call an overload to retrieve the encoding. 方法将调用对应方法来确定是否可以提供所请求编码。The method will call the corresponding method to determine whether it can supply the requested encoding.
